biography:
Elisabetta Marchetti (Rome, ...) is an Italian director and editor.

Debuted in 2000 in the television miniseries **Questa casa non Ã¨ un albergo**, which also takes care of the editing. He later collaborated on the television films Friends of Jesus and Carabinieri. Since 2009 she has directed the television series Don Matteo with Terence Hill and A family doctor with Lino Banfi.
